result.title: Repository of best practices and solutions for ET
result.description: Developed by CRES with input from all partners, in particular DIGI, RDFC, EAZR. Format: Report (pdf) + Appendices electronic file (.zip) with relevant information. The template to collect information from the partners for developing the Repository, will be in Excel format and will be delivered in M25.

result.title: Sharing system report
result.description: This report must present how the interaction with other initiatives will be done. Complete list of applications that could share information with ePLANET, description of sharing format and sharing data model. The report will reflect the results from Task 3.4.

result.title: Platform available for all stakeholders
result.description: During the execution of the project there will be 3 platform versions (one per year), closed and usable for the different stakeholders. The evolution of the versions will be governed by the feedback provided by the end users. This deliverable includes the works done in Tasks 3.3 and 3.5. This deliverable will be led by CIMNE.First version M13Second version M24
